title: What happepend Riot to Yorick
body: I dont know but I HAVE NEVER SEEN A YORICK I fell kinda sad for the guy  and I read on the wiki that Yorick is the only champ removed from the champion rotation And I fell playing Yorick but currently saving up for azir so please riot Make yorick not under rated so much ;(

My friend is a yorick main. He chews through mana pretty hard but most people have never seen him so he is actually kind of hard to counter play.
They said Yorick was getting a rework ages ago and the latest update on it is here http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/12/red-post-collection-sr-summoner-icon.html?m=1

Yorick is in the works for a rework. Much like Sion got his.
There were a bunch of champs Riot said desperately needed reworks, Sion, Yorick, Urgot and Warwick are the main ones.
Season 3 is where I saw yorick slide off the pick table.

its the meta. he is hard countered by mobility.
he does good vs all the tanky tops but cant do much but stop them in lane phase. he also falls off hard lategame even when super fed. not seen jungle yorick since the new jungle but he might be able to go ok in it.

a team of morde yi and yorick is extremely strong.
Thank you somone who agrees and some of his ablites can just carry top even at early ranks.             I love you {{champion:83}}

I think {{champion:83}}  should get a buff, a visual update and a gameplay update with new abilities since he is the only champion left out of the game so yeah,i feel sad for him too, if you are not gonna include a champion into the game then just remove him,because i can feel {{champion:83}} loneliness.He used to be such a good champ, and now, he's nothing.
